doc:
Dana Andrews https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dana_Andrews 0 Carver Dana Andrews (January 1, 1909 – December 17, 1992) was an American film actor and a major Hollywood star during the 1940s. He continued acting in less prestigious roles into the 1980s. The role for which he received the most praise was as war veteran Fred Derry in The Best Years of Our Lives (1946). Carver_Dana_Andrews ( January_1_,_1909 – December_17_,_1992 ) was an_American_film_actor and a_major_Hollywood_star during the_1940s . He continued_acting in less_prestigious_roles into the_1980s . The_role for which he received the_most_praise was as war_veteran_Fred_Derry in The_Best_Years of Our_Lives ( 1946_) .
